Boolean Retrieval.quote: Documents matching logical combinations: query = term1 AND term2 OR term3

Vector Space Model.quote: Documents as vectors: similarity = cos(θ) between document and query vectors

Query Processing.quote: Converting user input: raw query → processed query → results

Relevance Ranking.quote: Ordering search results: score = relevance_function(query, document)

Document Preprocessing.quote: Text preparation: tokenization → stopword removal → stemming

Page Rank.quote: Web page importance: rank based on incoming link structure

Clustering.quote: Grouping similar documents: similarity metrics → document clusters

Language Models.quote: Probability of text: P(term|document) for query likelihood

Probabilistic Retrieval.quote: Probability of relevance: BM25 scoring for document ranking

Semantic Search.quote: Meaning-based retrieval: concepts rather than just keywords

Index Compression.quote: Efficient storage: compression techniques for inverted indices

Relevance Feedback.quote: User input incorporation: results → feedback → improved results

Evaluation Metrics.quote: System performance: MAP, NDCG, MRR measure effectiveness

Multimedia Retrieval.quote: Non-text search: images, audio, video retrieval

Entity Search.quote: Finding specific entities: people, places, organizations

Query Understanding.quote: Intent recognition: query → interpretation → structured form

Document Summarization.quote: Content condensation: full text → key points

Real-time Search.quote: Immediate updates: new content → searchable instantly

Personalization.quote: User-adapted results: history + preferences → tailored ranking
